abstract: Most Wall Street chief executives struggle to keep the job they have. Laurence D. Fink, the founder of the BlackRock investment management firm, has the opposite problem. His name constantly surfaces for new ones.
lead_paragraph: Most Wall Street chief executives struggle to keep the job they have. Laurence D. Fink, the founder of the BlackRock investment management firm, has the opposite problem. His name constantly surfaces for new ones.

headline.main: A Perpetual Shortlistee, Now Touted at Merrill
